arts.sum: Dundee welcome Rangers to Dens Park in the William Hill Premiership on Sunday afternoon, with both sides looking to make a statement in Scotland’s top division. arts.sum: Rangers travel to Dens Park to take on Dundee FC this Sunday in the Scottish Premiership as they look to bounce back from consecutive defeats.
